mapper.select: SELECT a.poProductSeq ,a.poAccount ,c.productName ,c.productPrice ,c.productTypeCd ,d.memberName ,d.memberTypeCd ,b.poDelNy ,b.poRegDate ,b.poModDate FROM poProduct a LEFT JOIN placingOrder b on a.poSeqF = b.poSeq LEFT JOIN product c on a.productSeqF = c.productSeq LEFT JOIN member d on b.memberSeqF = d.memberSeq

SELECT a.poProductSeq ,a.poAccount ,c.productName ,c.productPrice ,c.productTypeCd ,d.memberName ,d.memberTypeCd ,b.poDelNy ,b.poRegDate ,b.poModDate FROM poProduct a LEFT JOIN placingOrder b on a.poSeqF = b.poSeq LEFT JOIN product c on a.productSeqF = c.productSeq LEFT JOIN member d on b.memberSeqF = d.memberSeq WHERE poProductSeq = #{poProductSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE poProduct set poProductDelNy = 1 WHERE poProductSeq = #{poProductSeq}
